message.raw:
feature: Made the offset index a part of the Indexed reader interface

1. Refactored _offset_index to be of a type that consistently provides
   a `find` method
2. Made `.index` a property on all Indexed readers that returns the
   offset index
message.html:
feature: Made the offset index a part of the Indexed reader interface

  1. Refactored _offset_index to be of a type that consistently provides
    a find method
  2. Made .index a property on all Indexed readers that returns the
    offset index
